TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content: Those were, i think, clamshell cradles, because of how they opened.
ok! thanks I forgot the name of them lol
Its ok, i actually am asking for those myself! So useful!
that would be a good adon for this mod. but lets wait for Mike\_NZ to finish with the far stuff be fore we ask for more attatchments
Yeah, besides, i told him i'll be pacing my series on the development of the mod.

> 
> that would be a good adon for this mod. but lets wait for Mike\_NZ to finish with the far stuff be fore we ask for more attatchments

Yes it is rather fustrating trying to get aero working right. Though I like to model as a break from configs.

Once I get FAR and the ISS done I will be free again to continue
Ok! That's fine. I was actually wondering whether or not i should run the series in rss...

whats the FSS rotator for?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T22:52:48Z" title="08/11/2015 10:52  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by Tristonwilson12**

> 
> Ok! That's fine. I was actually wondering whether or not i should run the series in rss...

Rss woul be awesome. 

I was close to perfect with far then messed it up again then went to bed grrrr

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> whats the FSS rotator for?

Rotates attached satellites or modules in 2 directions and decouples them

> 
> Rss woul be awesome. 
> I was close to perfect with far then messed it up again then went to bed grrrr
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Rotates attached satellites or modules in 2 directions and decouples them

thought so
What's the trick to get the parts into the cargo bay? I cannot get any (SLIC, FSS Base, Carrier, Space Lab etc) to snap onto any of the nodes.
Making the back elevons less powerful on the shuttle would be really nice. It flys like the shuttle put pitches up really hard and flips it alot

> 
> What's the trick to get the parts into the cargo bay? I cannot get any (SLIC, FSS Base, Carrier, Space Lab etc) to snap onto any of the nodes.

when dragging the attatchment you want, you attatch them to the bottom of the cargo bay.

if you new that. could you explain it a little more?

> 
> What's the trick to get the parts into the cargo bay? I cannot get any (SLIC, FSS Base, Carrier, Space Lab etc) to snap onto any of the nodes.

The nodes I am hoping should be in the right direction. They were updated in a recent release. I wi double check.

Try holding the alt key when hovering the part over the node.

> 
> when dragging the attatchment you want, you attatch them to the bottom of the cargo bay.
> if you new that. could you explain it a little more?

 Parts won't line up. Can get an occasional "snap" but it isn't in the cargo bay...

Seems the orbiter nodes got updated but the modules havent.

[https://github.com/MrMikeNZ/Space-Shuttle/tree/master/GameData/Space_Shuttle/Parts/Modules](https://github.com/MrMikeNZ/Space-Shuttle/tree/master/GameData/Space_Shuttle/Parts/Modules)

I updated fssbase.cfg and carrier.cfg

Copy and paste these to your space\_shuttle/parts/modules directory overwriting your current and let me know if it fixes one of them

> 
> Seems the orbiter nodes got updated but the modules havent.
> [https://github.com/MrMikeNZ/Space-Shuttle/tree/master/GameData/Space_Shuttle/Parts/Modules](https://github.com/MrMikeNZ/Space-Shuttle/tree/master/GameData/Space_Shuttle/Parts/Modules)
> 
> I updated fssbase.cfg and carrier.cfg
> 
> Copy and paste these to your space\_shuttle/parts/modules directory overwriting your current and let me know if it fixes one of them

Thank you. 

The problem ones were from the "All Extras" download. I went for the individual extras downloads and all is now good. Appreciate your hard work!
